description:
At times, you might want to create a new video project with the input requirements similar to previous project. At such circumstance, you can simply make a copy of the video project. To make a copy, follow these easy steps:


1. Click on 'My Videos' link in the menu tab.


2. Find the video you would like to copy.

3. Click on the menu icon [☰] located in the bottom-right corner of the video thumbnail.



4. Select on 'Edit Video' to create a copy the video.
description_text: At times, you might want to create a new video project with the input requirements similar to previous project. At such circumstance, you can simply make a copy of the video project. To make a copy, follow these easy steps:     1. Click on 'My Videos' link in the menu tab.      2. Find the video you would like to copy.  3. Click on the menu icon [☰] located in the bottom-right corner of the video thumbnail.         4. Select on 'Edit Video' to create a copy the video.
title: How do I make a copy of a video project?
